title: Little Lulu to Chicchai Nakama
original_name: リトル・ルルとちっちゃい仲間
opening_song: "Little Lulu to Chicchai Nakama (リトル・ルルとちっちゃい仲間)" by Young Fresh, Mitsuko Horie
ending_song: "Watashi wa Lulu (わたしはルル)" by Mitsuko Horie
sinopse:
The adventures of Little Lulu and her friends. The series is based on the famous character from comic strips and comic books.

(Source: AniDB)
